content: Did the release of Space Invaders in 1978 cause a shortage of ¥100 coins in Japan?

Yes, the release of Space Invaders in 1978 is often credited with causing a shortage of ¥100 coins in Japan. The game was incredibly popular and people were lining up to play it, inserting ¥100 coins into the machines. This led to a significant decrease in the number of ¥100 coins in circulation, as they were being hoarded in the game machines. The Japanese government had to increase the production of ¥100 coins to meet the demand.
